statements: SELECT * FROM SatelliteCommunicationAccessControl;
SELECT user_id, role FROM SatelliteCommunicationAccessControl WHERE access_level = 'Admin';
SELECT id, access_level FROM SatelliteCommunicationAccessControl ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT access_level FROM SatelliteCommunicationAccessControl;
SELECT * FROM SatelliteCommunicationAccessControl WHERE role = 'Engineer' AND access_level = 'Limited';
SELECT id, user_id, role, access_level FROM SatelliteCommunicationAccessControl WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM SatelliteCommunicationAccessControl WHERE access_level = 'high' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT id, role, user_id FROM SatelliteCommunicationAccessControl WHERE role = 'engineer' AND access_level = 'medium';
SELECT MAX(user_id) as max_user_id, COUNT(id) as total_records FROM SatelliteCommunicationAccessControl GROUP BY role;
SELECT DISTINCT role FROM SatelliteCommunicationAccessControl ORDER BY role ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM communications WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, communication_type, timestamp FROM communications ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM communications WHERE user_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT user_id, communication_type, timestamp FROM communications WHERE communication_type = 'Email' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%John%';
SELECT user_id, username, communication_type FROM users LEFT JOIN communications ON users.user_id = communications.user_id;
SELECT * FROM access_control;
SELECT user_id, role FROM access_control WHERE permission = true;
SELECT id, timestamp, event_type FROM system_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT data_content FROM satellite_data WHERE data_type = 'image';
SELECT id, role, permission FROM access_control WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM access_control WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT id, data_type FROM satellite_data WHERE id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT user_id, permission FROM access_control WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3) AND role LIKE 'su%';
SELECT timestamp, details FROM system_logs WHERE event_type = 'error' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT id, role, permission FROM access_control WHERE role = 'user' AND permission = TRUE ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM SatelliteCommunications;
SELECT satellite_name, location FROM SatelliteCommunications WHERE access_level > 2;
SELECT * FROM AccessControlUsers ORDER BY role DESC;
SELECT username, department FROM AccessControlUsers WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT message, priority FROM SystemAlerts WHERE acknowledged = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM SatelliteCommunications WHERE access_level > 3 ORDER BY satellite_name DESC;
SELECT satellite_name, location, access_level FROM SatelliteCommunications WHERE location LIKE '%USA%' ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT user_id, username, role, department FROM AccessControlUsers WHERE role = 'Admin' AND department = 'Engineering';
SELECT user_id, SUM(priority) AS total_priority FROM CommunicationLogs INNER JOIN SystemAlerts ON CommunicationLogs.log_id = SystemAlerts.alert_id GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_priority > 10;
SELECT * FROM CommunicationLogs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM access_control;
SELECT user_id, permission_level FROM access_control WHERE permission_level='admin';
SELECT user_id, log_date FROM communication_logs ORDER BY log_date DESC;
SELECT log_id, log_date, log_details FROM communication_logs WHERE user_id=1;
SELECT satellite_name, data_type, data_contents FROM satellite_data WHERE data_type='image';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE user_id > 100 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT permission_level, user_id FROM access_control WHERE permission_level = 'admin' AND user_id < 50;
SELECT * FROM communication_logs WHERE log_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY log_date ASC;
SELECT status_id, satellite_name, status_description FROM system_status WHERE status_code = 200;
